about_the_game:
"Love for love, love for hate."

◆Story

SUPER METEOR" is "the light of hope in the universe

Due to rapid technological development and space exploration, "human beings" living on the earth have released a large amount of "space debris" out of the planet. Feeling abandoned by the people of Earth, the space debris has gone on a rampage in space with a vengeance, inflicting tremendous damage on various star races.

In order to bring them back to their senses and return them to Earth, the "Super Meteor," the light of hope in the universe, has risen up. Can Super Meteor protect the universe?

◆Outline

Become "Super Meteor," the "light of hope in the universe," and restore peace to the universe by dodging the attacks of space debris that have lost their self and are on a rampage, and by touching space debris to show them "kindness" and restore their sanity.
The controls are simple. Move with the Gamepad stick as Super Meteor, which moves like a meteor, and touch the space debris while avoiding enemy attacks.

name: Super Meteor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Can "Super Meteor" save the universe from the space debris created by the development of space by the people of Earth?
